response.explain: The previous action code successfully opened the carton. The next step is to move the robot to the box of chocolates.
response.subtask:
(1) Register the box of chocolates and the carton.
(2) Move the robot to the carton.
(3) Open the carton.
(4) Move the robot to the box of chocolates.
(5) Grasp the box of chocolates.
(6) Move the robot to the carton.
(7) Put the box of chocolates inside the carton.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 4: Move the robot to the box of chocolates
    box_of_chocolates_197 = registry(env,"box_of_chocolates_197")
    MoveBot(env, robot, box_of_chocolates_197, camera)
    donothing(env)
